Others: The match is slated to resume at 10 past 11. The Super Soppers are out on the field as the groundsmen try to make the outfield as dry as possible with the sun out yet again after the last bout of rain.
The next pitch inspection is slated for 10:45 PM IST.
The weather forecast in Guyana for the next couple of days is as bad as it can get. On June 25 and June 26, the rain prediction in the area is also very high.
